csw:Record.dc:title: Lake Ice Extent: northern hemisphere daily (raster 500m) - version 1, July 2021
csw:Record.dc:subject: Orthoimagery
lake
ice
river/lake ice breakup
NHEMI
Dekad
1 day composite
inlandWaters
csw:Record.dct:abstract:
Lake ice is a good climate indicator and interesting parameter in hydrological modelling, weather prediction and, after integration over time, estimating dates for ice phenology events (ice break-up, ice-off).
Lake Ice Extent products classify ice for freshwater bodies, per cloud-free pixel, into (i) fully snow covered ice, (ii) partially snow covered ice/clear ice and (iii) open water.
csw:Record.dc:description:
Lake ice is a good climate indicator and interesting parameter in hydrological modelling, weather prediction and, after integration over time, estimating dates for ice phenology events (ice break-up, ice-off).
Lake Ice Extent products classify ice for freshwater bodies, per cloud-free pixel, into (i) fully snow covered ice, (ii) partially snow covered ice/clear ice and (iii) open water.
csw:Record.dc:source: The input data are the 1 day Top measured by the The Sea and Land Surface Temperature Radiometer (SLSTR) sensor.
